records.quote: We must accept finite disappointment, but we must never lose infinite hope.
records.author: Martin Luther King Jr

records.quote: To succeed, you have to do something and be very bad at it for a while. You have to look bad before you can look really good.
records.author: Barbara DeAngelis

records.quote: First, solve the problem. Then, write the code.
records.author: John Johnson

records.quote: Any fool can write code that a computer can understand. Good programmers write code that humans can understand.
records.author: Martin Fowler

records.quote: Experience is the name everyone gives to their mistakes.
records.author: Oscar Wilde

records.quote: Code is like humor. When you have to explain it, itâ€™s bad.
records.author: Cory House

records.quote: Fix the cause, not the symptom.
records.author: Steve Maguire

records.quote: Before software can be reusable it first has to be usable.
records.author: Ralph Johnson

records.quote: Perfection is achieved not when there is nothing more to add, but rather when there is nothing more to take away.
records.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery
